snippet: For their monthlong vacation, Bill and Hillary Clinton have rented a home in Sagaponack that is on a lot near the ocean.
abstract: Former president Bill Clinton and his wife Hillary Rodham Clinton are reportedly planning a monthlong vacation in Sagaponack, NY.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and JIM RUTENBERG

lead_paragraph: For their monthlong vacation, Bill and Hillary Clinton have rented a home in Sagaponack that is on a lot near the ocean.

headline.main: Clintons Find a New Place to Vacation in the Hamptons
headline.print_headline: Clintons Find a New Place to Vacation in the Hamptons
